ClassDesc: Constants and parameter names for controlling text-to-speech. These include: Intents to ask engine to install data or check its data and extras for a TTS engine's check data activity. Keys for the parameters passed with speak commands, e.g. @B_android#speech#tts#TextToSpeech#Engine#KEY_PARAM_UTTERANCE_ID_E@, @B_android#speech#tts#TextToSpeech#Engine#KEY_PARAM_STREAM_E@. A list of feature strings that engines might support, e.g @B_android#speech#tts#TextToSpeech#Engine#KEY_FEATURE_NETWORK_SYNTHESIS_E@. These values may be passed in to @B_android#speech#tts#TextToSpeech#speak_E@ and @B_android#speech#tts#TextToSpeech#synthesizeToFile_E@ to modify engine behaviour. The engine can be queried for the set of features it supports through @B_android#speech#tts#TextToSpeech#getFeatures_E@.
